title: shakti vishAlAkSi
sahitya:
shakti vishAlAkSi samEta vishvanAtha sAmiyE Om sharaNam shivagangEshanE


anupallavi

  bhaktiyum jnAnamum karma yOgamum tandu pArAlaya vAzhvu sIrOngavE aruLvAi


caraNam    oruvA uyirk-kulattin iraivA uLam tOrum OmkAra naTam purivAi iruvOnga uruvOnga 
arivOnga serivOnga jayamOnga shiva jIva siddhOngavE aruLum shuddhAnanda jyOtiyE
